u.a: EXP introduces magnet activity and explains that she'll be videotaping Mot's and Chi's hands .

CHAT.comment: Time is 19:42. Video tape does not start until later; transcript until then is solely from audio tape

MOT and Chi play well throughout the activity. Bro is only superficially included; he seems too young to follow everything. EXP remains in the background , offering occasional encouragement or laughing. There is a substantial amount of experimentation with the magnets. Mot and Chi spend a lot of time experimenting with magnets that repel each other and testing the magnetic qualities of different types of matter. Mot makes a few attempts to give a scientific explanation for what happens , but then stops mid-sentence saying she doesn't really know the reasoning behind it all.

u.a: Chi and Bro play with magnets while Mot and EXP set up room for videotaping and discuss if it's okay for Bro to play also; Mot decides it will be easier to let Bro play
